data.title: About: Barun Sobti
data.meta_description: Barun Sobti (/bɑːrun ˈsoʊbtə/ SOBE-te; born 21 August 1984) is an Indian actor, known for his roles in television series Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon (2011–2012) and Asur (2020–present). He started his acting career in 2009 with Star Plus show Shraddha and later appeared in a negative role in Dill Mill Gayye. He portrayed his first lead role in Sony Entertainment Television's Baat Hamari Pakki Hai (2010). In 2011, Sobti rose to fame by playing Arnav Singh Raizada in Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon. He made his film debut with the romantic comedy Main Aur Mr. Riight (2014) and then went onto appear in films like Tu Hai Mera Sunday (2017), 22 Yards (2019), Halahal (2020) and 200 Halla Ho (2021).
data.text:
dbo:abstract

بارون سوبتي هيرت (بالإنجليزية: Barun Sobti Heart)‏ (21 أغسطس 1984 -).ممثل سينمائي وتلفزيوني هندي.بدأ حياته الفنية في التمثيل على قناة(ستار بلس) في المسلسل اليومي (شرادها).اكتسب شهرته بعد مسلسل (موعد زفاف) في دور شرافان ومسلسل (من النظرة الثانية) في دور ارناف (ar)

Barun Sobti (/bɑːrun ˈsoʊbtə/ SOBE-te; born 21 August 1984) is an Indian actor, known for his roles in television series Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon (2011–2012) and Asur (2020–present). He started his acting career in 2009 with Star Plus show Shraddha and later appeared in a negative role in Dill Mill Gayye. He portrayed his first lead role in Sony Entertainment Television's Baat Hamari Pakki Hai (2010). In 2011, Sobti rose to fame by playing Arnav Singh Raizada in Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon. He made his film debut with the romantic comedy Main Aur Mr. Riight (2014) and then went onto appear in films like Tu Hai Mera Sunday (2017), 22 Yards (2019), Halahal (2020) and 200 Halla Ho (2021). He also starred in the Disney+ Hotstar series Tanhaiyan (2017) and ALT Balaji series The Great Indian Dysfunctional Family (2018). He also narrated the audiobook "The Last Boy to fall in Love" by Durjoy Datta for Audible. (en)

Barun Sobti (lahir 21 Agustus 1984) adalah seorang aktor televisi dan film India. Dia memulai karier aktingnya dengan serial televisi berorientasi Star Plus . Peran pertamanya adalah sebagai Shravan Jaiswal di dengan Ankita Sharma. Pada tahun 2011, ia memerankan taipan bisnis Arnav Singh Raizada dalam drama 2011 Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon? (2011 TV series) berlawanan dengan Sanaya Irani. Dia kemudian muncul di seri 2017 web berlawanan dengan Surbhi Jyoti. Dia akan segera tampil dalam film kritis yang terkenal Tu Hai Mera Sunday yang rencananya akan dirilis pada tanggal 6 Oktober di India. Dia saat ini menggambarkan peran Advay Singh Raizada di Iss pyaar ko kya naam doon 3. (in)

Барун Собти (англ. Barun Sobti, род. 21 августа 1984, Дели, Индия) — индийский актёр и модель. (ru)

He started his acting career in 2009 with Star Plus show Shraddha and later appeared in a negative role in Dill Mill Gayye.
